targets.expr: {filename="/var/log/binary.log", deployer_name=~"$Validator", deployer_region=~"$Region"} | json | target =~ ".*battleware_randotron.*" | line_format ` [{{.detected_level}}] {{.fields_message}}{{if .fields_generating}} generating={{.fields_generating}}{{end}}{{if .fields_lobby}} lobby={{.fields_lobby}}{{end}}{{if .fields_battle}} battle={{.fields_battle}}{{end}}{{if .fields_elapsed}} elapsed={{.fields_elapsed}}{{end}}{{if .fields_attempts}} attempts={{.fields_attempts}}{{end}}`
